name: Riedenburger Alkoholfrei
description: This Bavarian beauty is not quite ‘alcohol free’ but at less than 0.5% it’s the next best thing. The real delight here is the ‘flavour’, it’s got real bite and a refreshing citrus lift in the malty finish. Brewed from 50% spelt malt, it’s streets ahead of most other offerings out there, and all ingredients are of course organic too. Great for athletes (it’s also isotonic) and for those who just want a satisying drink without the alcohol, and for drivers too.

name: St Peter’s Organic ‘Without’ Alcohol Free Pale Ale (50cl)
description: A zero alcohol craft beer that tastes as good as the real thing, and is suitable for both lager and ale drinkers. Distinctly zesty, citrus and biscuit flavours, followed by smooth, creamy, hoppy bitterness.

name: Riedenburger Dolden Null Non Alcoholic Beer 0.5%
description: Excellent fruity and hoppy craft beer (IPA) without the alcohol, well less than 0.5% anyway. Slips down a treat, it has plenty of character.

name: Opia Alcohol Free Cabernet Sauvignon
description: The ageing process involves the infusion of organic grape pips and French oak to ensure structure and aroma. With its jammy fruits of blackcurrant and cherry with some vanilla and clove on the palate, this is a delicious alcohol free alternative to wine that’s also made with no added sulphur.

name: Opia Alcohol Free Sparkling Chardonnay
description: Opia is an innovative unfermented drink made using organic grapes, and without any added sulphites. This sparkling organic alcohol free Chardonnay has a creamy mousse and big flavours of white pear, green apple and refreshing lime. For all to enjoy.

name: Ashridge Organic Sparkling Elderflower Pressé (33cl)
description: For an absolutely unique, truly enjoyable organic soft drink, try this Elderflower Pressé. This Pressé is light, floral, and beautifully aromatic. It is an amazing soft drink, one that anyone can enjoy–even kids, as it is alcohol free. Ashridge produces this Elderflower Pressé using the traditional Champagne methods, and you’ll find that this is one of their most creative and delicious drinks.

name: Karma Cola Bin End
description: Real cola with a conscience! Made from organic, Fairtrade ingredients – including genuine cola nuts from Sierra Leone and fair trade organic vanilla – Karma Cola delivers classic, refreshing flavour with a hint of spice and citrus. Every sip supports growers and their communities. Great taste, good vibes and a little bit of feel-good karma in every bottle. PAST BEST BEFORE DATE – Sept 2025

name: Opia Alcohol Free Chardonnay
description: Pale yellow with green hues, the nose discloses aromas of acacia and peach, combined with a touch of citrus and vanilla. The palate is fresh and lively. Best non-alcoholic drinks, Women’s Health Magazine Feb 2023

name: Opia Alcohol Free Cabernet Rosé
description: A delicious alcohol free rosé wine that’s also made with no added sulphur. Capturing the true delicate rosé colour, the nose displays abundant redcurrant and raspberry aromas, with mouthwatering notes of pink grapefruit on the palate.

name: Opia Virgin Sparkling Red Fruits
description: A refined, alcohol-free sparkling drink that delights the senses with its vibrant blend of red berries. Crafted from organic grapes and enriched with natural fruit flavors, it offers a refreshing bouquet of cherry, raspberry and redcurrant aromas. With its fine bubbles and balanced sweetness, this elegant beverage is perfect for celebratory moments or simply enjoying a sophisticated alternative to traditional sparkling wines – without the alcohol.

name: Luscombe Citrus & Fruit Bonanza
description: These exceptional organic still juices are made by Luscombe in Devon from only the finest quality organic whole fruits from trusted growers. No concentrates are used here, resulting in unmatched fruit purity and flavours. They’re great on their own, or as mixers (we do recommend the orange juice mixed with fizz for the perfect weekend brunch mimosa!). 24 bottles total, 8x each of the Luscombe Orange, Apple and Lemon. Apple Juice past best before date 09/05/25 Orange Juice past best before date 24/07/25 Lemonade past best before date 02/08/25 About Luscombe: Luscombe are passionate about making premium soft drinks and juices. They hand select organic ingredients from trusted growers worldwide and produce their drinks in Devon, England. Their multi-award-winning drinks are made from soft Devon water from their own spring from freshly pressed organic fruit. Every step–from sourcing, harvesting, juicing, blending, and bottling–gets their undivided attention. With a Royal Warrant in hand, over 110 Great Taste Award stars from the Guild of Fine Food and an abundance of positive customer reviews, we know you’ll love their premium juices and soft drinks.

name: Opia Virgin Sparkling Bellini
description: A fresh, alcohol-free twist on the classic Venetian cocktail – this Bellini blends gently sparkling, dealcoholised organic grapes with natural white peach extract for a soft, elegant and fruit-driven pour. Delicate and refreshing, with just the right amount of sweetness and lift, it captures all the charm of a summer brunch or pre-dinner apéritif – without the alcohol. Can be used as a mixer or perfect on its own with ice and a sprig of mint. No added sugar, no artificial flavours and 100% organic.

name: Opia Virgin Sparkling Spritz
description: Not your average alcohol-free fizz – this is a proper spritz, full of citrus zest, botanical lift and bright, refreshing sparkle. Built on a base of dealcoholised organic Chardonnay, the Opia Spritz is blended with natural extracts of bitter orange, lemon and herbs to deliver that grown-up balance of bitterness, freshness and fruit. Lively, dry and lightly complex – think Amalfi citrus meets French apéro – it’s perfect straight from the fridge, as a mixer, over ice or topped with a slice of orange. No added sugar, no artificial flavours and 100% organic. A delicate aperitive for those who don’t want to have alcohol.

name: Karma Drinks Gingerella Ginger Ale Can
description: Fiery, refreshing and made with real organic ginger – Gingerella brings a lively kick of spice balanced by fair trade organic cane sugar and citrus. Packed in a fully recyclable can, it’s the perfect mix of heat, sweetness and good karma. A bold, natural ginger ale that tastes as good as it feels.

name: Karma Drinks Lemony Lemonade Can
description: Made with organic lemons and Fairtrade organic cane sugar, this is lemonade at its most refreshing – zesty, bright and perfectly balanced. Now in a fully recyclable can, so it’s as kind to the planet as it is thirst-quenching. A burst of sunshine in a can – naturally delicious and made with good karma.
